text:
Opinion CANNIBAL KILLER Deranged junkie son caught by his mum EATING boy, 7, he beheaded and chopped up after abducting kid off the street 
Nazim Miyan, described as a local drug addict, has been charged with murder and kidnapping By Mydrim Jones Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A HORRIFIED mother found her drug-addict son eating the body of a seven-year-old boy – who he had murdered and beheaded. 
Nazim Miyan’s mum reportedly stumbled upon the gruesome scene in an abandoned house in Pilibhit in north India. MJCANNY MYDRIM JONES 3 Cannibal killer Nazim Miyan has been charged with murder 
Miyan, who is in his mid-20s, had reportedly cut the little lad’s neck, arms and legs into several pieces after luring him away from his friends. 
A stunned cop describes the chilling moment he saw the child’s decapitated corpse. 
He said: “The body was lying on the floor with the decapitated head beside it. related stories Millions of humans doomed to become CANNIBALS due to drought and famine, expert warns OFF THE EATEN TRACK From Uganda and Russia to Germany and COLCHESTER, the places around the world where cases of cannibalism are still recorded 'I'm not going to lie..it was gross' Drew Barrymore talks playing a cannibal zombie in new Netflix series Santa Clarita Diet DON'T TEMPT THE BEAST Mark Labbett turned down I’m A Celebrity because he feared he’d turn to ‘cannibalism’ to survive MEAT AND GREET ‘Cannibal’ prisoners boast of barbecuing HUMAN flesh in shocking video at ‘lawless’ Brazilian jail where drug gang riots led to beheadings and violent murders THE DRUG THAT EATS JUNKIES Horrific pics show addicts left with scaly crocodile skin after injecting 'cannibal' drug Krokodil that haunts Russia after sweeping the country and killing more than heroin DESPERATE MEASURES Harrowing pics show starving Russians selling human body parts as MEAT during 1920s famine CANNIBAL KILLER Naked German cannibal poses with an axe in dungeon where he murdered, chopped up and ate WILLING victim he'd met online 
“The skin on the abdomen was missing and internal body parts and bloodstains were scattered across the room.” 
The officer added that the killer was sitting near the corpse and surrendered to police without any resistance. 
Cops recovered a knife and a shovel from the grisly scene. 
Hundreds of furious protesters reportedly gathered outside the police station demanding Miyan be lynched. 
He has been charged with murder and abduction. MJCANNY MYDRIM JONES The tragic child’s body was reportedly found by the killer’s mother MJCANNY MYDRIM JONES 3 The corpse pictured wrapped in a blanket in a blood-soaked room 
Miyan, described locally as a drug addict, apparently lured Mohammad Monis into the house while he was playing outside with other kids. 
Miyan was incoherent when quizzed by investigators, according to sources close to the case. 
He was kept in custody when he appeared in court in Pilibhit on Wednesday. 
“We will try to complete the investigation of the case and submit the final charge sheet in court,” police officer Devranjan Verma told the Hindustan Times.
